snippet: As the United Nations authorized African and French military forces to deploy to protect civilians, reporters and aid workers reported from a country descending into deeper tides of blood.
abstract: As the United Nations authorized African and French military forces to deploy to protect civilians, reporters and aid workers reported from a country descending into deeper tides of blood.

headline.main: Reports From the Central African Republic's 'Darkest Days'

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
